org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.actl

Class ACTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.actl.ACTL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACTLAtomic, ACTLBinary, ACTLUnary

    public abstract class ACTL
extends Logic
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class is the base of ACTL formulae.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPromisedFormula

        public abstract ACTL getPromisedFormula()
        Returns the formula promised by this formula. If this formula is A(q U p) or AF p, the promised formula is p.
        Returns:
        the formula promised by this formula, or null if this formula is not promising

      • containsPromising

        public abstract boolean containsPromising()
        Returns true if this formula contains a promising sub-formula.
        Returns:
        true if this formula contains a promising sub-formula

      • renameFreeVariable

        public abstract ACTL renameFreeVariable(Proposition p,
                                        Proposition q)
        Renames a free proposition.
        Parameters:
        p - the proposition to be renamed
        q - the new proposition after renaming
        Returns:
        the formula obtained by renaming p to q in this formula

      • substitute

        public abstract ACTL substitute(Proposition p,
                                ACTL formula)
        Replaces a specified proposition by a specified formula.
        Parameters:
        p - a proposition
        formula - a formula
        Returns:
        the formula obtained by replacing p with formula

      • substitute

        public abstract ACTL substitute(java.util.Map<Proposition,ACTL> subst)
        Returns an ACTL formula obtained by substituting an ACTL formula for a proposition where the formulae and propositions are specified by a map.
        Parameters:
        subst - a map from a proposition to its replacement
        Returns:
        the expression obtained by replacing the domain of subst with the range of subst in formula

      • negate

        public static ACTL negate(ACTL formula)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the negation of an ACTL formula.
        Parameters:
        formula - an ACTL formula
        Returns:
        the negation of the ACTL formula
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the negation of the formula contains negative temporal formula
